query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM User a WHERE a.userName=?1
select object(o) from User o
select object(o) from Country o
select object(o) from Language o
select object(o) from SecretQuestion o
select object(o) from FileType o
select object(o) from FileType o where o.desc = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MusicFile a WHERE a.user.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MusicFile a WHERE a.album.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MusicFile a WHERE a.artist.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MusicFile a WHERE a.genre.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MusicFile a WHERE a.user.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MusicFile a, IN (a.relMusicMixes) b WHERE b.mixesId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Genre a WHERE a.user.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Genre a WHERE a.desc=?1 AND a.user.id=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Mixes a, IN (a.relMusicMixes) b WHERE b.musicFile.user.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Mixes a WHERE a.genre.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM RelMusicMixes a WHERE a.mixes.id=?1
select object(o) from UserType o
select object(o) from UserStatus o
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Album a WHERE a.user.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Album a WHERE a.desc=?1 AND a.user.id=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Artist a WHERE a.user.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Artist a WHERE a.desc=?1 AND a.user.id=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Contact a WHERE a.user.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PhotoAlbum a WHERE a.user.id=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Photo a, IN (a.relPhotoAlbum) b WHERE b.albumId=?1
select object(a) from Photo a where a.user.id=?1
select object(o) from Application o
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM ShortCut a WHERE a.user.id=?1
select object(o) from Skin o

ejb-relation.description: Wallpaper relationship. The User table will contain the id of the Photo used by the user as the wallpaper.
